concept.title: C++ Standard Library (STLport v4)
concept.shortdesc: C++ Standard Library is a Symbian platform port of STLport v4. It enables applications written using Standard C++ to be ported to Symbian platform.

li.p: It is recommended that you use the latest version of Standard C++ Library (STLport v5) to take advantage of it's latest features. For more information about STLport, see http://www.stlport.org/. For information about how to migrate to STLport v5, see Migrating from STLport v4 to v5.
For more information about Open C++ (C++ Standard Library - STLport v4) API reference and examples, see Forum Nokia Library.
